ReportSection.Static:

Averages are based on the people currently in the table, so previous averages may differ slightly as it does not factor in people who are no longer in the department

ReportItemSet.title: Annual Report
ReportItemSet.ReportItem:
Instructions:
  • Click on a word in the document below to annotate it with a "Sticky Note". (Only words in headers can have a sticky note added)
  • To delete an annotation, delete any text in the annotation and press the 'X' icon.
  • Make sure to press the "Save" button at the bottom of the page after you have made changes.
{$item}

If.ReportItem:
Recommendations

Increment Tenure Promotion
{$item}

Else.ReportItem:
Recommendations

Increment Promotion
{$item}

ReportItemSet.Else: You are not allowed to view the recommendations for this user.
